{{official|1=http://www.just.gva.es/pls/civisc/p_civis.municipios?codcat=46146}} | footnotes = }} '''Xeresa''' ({{IPA-ca|ʃeˈɾeza|va}}, {{lang-es|Jeresa}}) is a [[Municipalities of Spain|municipality]] in the [[Comarques of the Valencian Community|''comarca'']] of [[Safor]] in the [[Valencia (autonomous community)|Valencian Community]], [[Spain]]. {{Safor}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of Valencia]] [[Category:Safor]] [[Category:Populated places in the Province of Valencia]] {{valencia-geo-stub}}
